search_query: Gen Digital competitors 2025 consumer cybersecurity market
context: Gen Digital Inc. is a consumer cyber safety company focused on Norton, LifeLock, Avast consumer security products. Consumer cyber safety leader. AI-powered threat protection.

competitors.name: McAfee
competitors.notes: Major direct competitor in consumer security with comprehensive antivirus and protection offerings

competitors.name: Trend Micro
competitors.notes: Direct competitor operating globally in consumer security market with strong product portfolio

competitors.name: Kaspersky Lab
competitors.notes: Major global competitor with 500M+ users in 150+ countries, broadened BUILD program in 2025 lowering entry barriers for developers to plug white-space capabilities into platform

competitors.name: Bitdefender
competitors.notes: Cybersecurity leader with 500M+ users in 150+ countries, offering GravityZone unified platform with advanced endpoint protection, EDR, XDR, and cloud workload security, consistently top-ranked in independent tests

competitors.name: ESET
competitors.notes: Competitor in consumer security competing through competitive pricing, product development, and targeted marketing

competitors.name: Palo Alto Networks
competitors.notes: Broader cybersecurity competitor with enterprise and consumer-oriented security solutions

competitors.name: SolarWinds
competitors.notes: Competitor in cybersecurity and network/systems management space

competitors.name: WatchGuard Technologies
competitors.notes: Cybersecurity competitor focusing on network security and endpoint protection

competitors.name: EScan
competitors.notes: Antivirus and security software competitor in consumer market

competitors.name: SailPoint Technologies
competitors.notes: Competitor in identity security and governance space

competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Largest competitor by installation share via Windows Defender included in OS by default - will continue dominating installation base as majority of market consolidates around handful of vendors

competitors.name: Aura
competitors.notes: Identity protection competitor with digital safety solutions, credit monitoring, VPN, and antivirus protection

competitors.name: Nord Security
competitors.notes: Competitor in privacy and security tools with VPN and protection services

competitors.name: FinTech competitors
competitors.notes: New competitive segment following MoneyLion acquisition in April 2025, bringing financial wellness competitors into Gen Digital's competitive landscape
